OOC: Don't you mean Robots in Disguise?  =3DP
  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, Apr=
il 21, 2001 9:49 PM
  Subject: Re: Pick on Hot Rod day


  OOC: Well Johnny=
, its like this, the Japenesse continuity has had so
  many shows and went =
so far off track from the original Transformers that
  they lost track of w=
hat the hell they were doing and pretty much messed
  everything up. This s=
tarted after they did Transformers: Headmasters.
  Anyway here is what I ca=
me up with in my head to fit 'Car Robots' in.
  After the TF race stoped al=
l contact with Earth, the great upgrade
  happaned, and they became Maximal=
s and Predacons. After Beast Wars Neo,
  a group of Predacons(Destron/Destr=
onger in Japan) went back in time, to
  Earth. Why? We dont know. Anyway Op=
timus Prime(Fire Convoy) and the last
  Autobots followed. What I dont gat =
is why the original TF's arn't in it.
  It is in 2000, so it would be 5 yea=
rs before Tf: The Movie.

  Things are going to get wierder because in a fe=
w months America is going
  to 'car' TF's again. A new toy line called TF: =
Robots in Desquise will
  be released. Also 'Car Robots' will be inported, =
and tweaked a little so
  it fits the American continuity. It will probably=
 have Predacons, after
  Beast Machines, going to Earth, and finding that t=
he last Autobots were
  hiding there. They will probably change the year 20=
00 thing and set in a
  appropriat year. Well I hope I cleared things up, a=
lthough I probably
  confused you even more.

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor=
 
       
       

  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Ter=
ms of Service.
